Trigger.Name: Deluge Of Darkness (AoE)
Trigger.RegularExpression: \A.{15}14:55F1:Cloud Of Darkness starts using Deluge Of Darkness

Trigger.Name: Ground-Razing Particle Beam (AoE)
Trigger.RegularExpression: \A.{15}14:5625:Cloud Of Darkness starts using Ground-Razing Particle Beam

Trigger.Name: Obscure Woods (AoE)
Trigger.RegularExpression: \A.{15}14:55EE:Cloud Of Darkness starts using Obscure Woods

Trigger.Name: Empty Plane (AoE)
Trigger.RegularExpression: \A.{15}14:55EF:Cloud Of Darkness starts using Empty Plane

Trigger.Name: AoD Variable (var:AoDTracker)
Trigger.RegularExpression: \A.{15}14:560(?<id>[1234]):Cloud Of Darkness starts using The (Second|Third) Art Of Darkness

Trigger.Name: The Art of Darkness
Trigger.RegularExpression: \A.{15}14:(?<id>5[AB5][F94][EB56]):Cloud Of Darkness starts using The Art Of Darkness

Trigger.Name: Anti-Air Phaser Unlimited
Trigger.RegularExpression: \A.{15}14:561[23]:Cloud Of Darkness starts using Anti-Air Phaser Unlimited

Trigger.Name: Wide-Angle Phaser Unlimited
Trigger.RegularExpression: \A.{15}14:560[DE]:Cloud Of Darkness starts using Wide-Angle Phaser Unlimited

Trigger.Name: Devouring Dark (Tank Swap)
Trigger.RegularExpression: \A.{15}14:5623:Cloud Of Darkness starts using Devouring Dark

Trigger.Name: Full-Perimeter Particle Beam (Dynamo)
Trigger.RegularExpression: \A.{15}14:5629:Cloud Of Darkness starts using Full-Perimeter Particle Beam

Trigger.Name: Flood of Obscurity (Knockback)
Trigger.RegularExpression: \A.{15}14:5907:Cloud Of Darkness starts using Flood Of Obscurity

Trigger.Name: Particle Concentration (Towers)
Trigger.RegularExpression: \A.{15}14:5620:Cloud Of Darkness starts using Particle Concentration

Trigger.Name: Curse of Darkness (Look Away)
Trigger.RegularExpression: \A.{15}1A:[\w]{8}:(?<player>[\w-' ]{3,21}) gains the effect of Curse Of Darkness from Cloud Of Darkness for 15

Trigger.Name: Hypercharged Condensation (Adds)
Trigger.RegularExpression: \A.{15}14:560C:Cloud Of Darkness starts using Hypercharged Condensation

Trigger.Name: Flood of Emptiness (Tiles)
Trigger.RegularExpression: \A.{15}14:55F0:Cloud Of Darkness starts using Flood Of Emptiness
